Name: Super Slam Dunk Touchdown
About the game: What is Super Slam Dunk Touchdown? SSDT is action! SSDT is teamwork! SSDT IS SPORTS! Soccer, hockey, football, roller derby, basketball and baseball players combine with every ball imaginable to form the sportsiest sports game ever. Each player has unique shots, attacks and abilities. Each ball has real world physics properties, and each arena is different. Score in the net, hoop, or field goal. Slam dunk or run into the end zone! Watch out for banana peels, streaking fans and ice resurfacing trucks, not to mention the opposing team. There are no holds barred, no rules and no other game quite like it. Extra Seasoning Season Mode is here. Play solo or with up to two more friends for a massive looping 3 player season mode that takes you out of this world! Defeat the six other teams in the SSDT league as you play through the seasons, unlocking new characters, new training games, new balls, new team colors and more. Earn fans to generate ticket sales, customize your home arena and build the sports team of your dreams. Track your season game stats, find secrets and play season after season to discover over a dozen different season endings. Will you collect all 6 of coach's trophies? Co-op/Competitive Couch Chaos Configure your matches your way with loads of match options, and play with up to six players locally, 3-on-3. Whether you invite your friends online with Steam Remote Play or get a bigger couch: teamwork is key to victory. Touchdown! 6 Player Modes Quick Match Mini Game? Free-For-All! Practice Mode More?! 3 Player Modes Season Mode Challenge Mode More?! CH-CH-CH-CHIEVO! Season Mode contains more than meets the eye: Dive in to start unlocking a mind-shattering 100 achievements for a sense of pride and accomplishment. To master all the sports you must journey down a rabbit hole of mystery, corruption and intrigue. You may very well decide the fate of the entire human race... SPORTS!
